name: **Pointabulloge Island**
description: Pointabulloge Island V848-377 Sheet 88 Pointabulloge Island is a pleasant long narrow island that is separated from the mainland by a narrow channel. Passage through the channel is only possible at times close to HW as the area dries quickly. The island is grazed and walking is attractive. Camping is good, although water was not found. Landing is best at E end of the channel onto a small stony beach at times of HW, otherwise onto rocky foreshore. Ringed Plover, Oystercatcher and Otter present.
